sourcesContent:
import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" const ModalCard = ({data, handleIdSearch}) => { return(
handleIdSearch(data.id,"movie") }>

{data.media_type ? {original_name} : `${data.title} (${data.original_title})` }

{data.tagline}

Estreno: {data.media_type ? dateNormalization(data.release_date) : dateNormalization(data.release_date)}

Votos de la gente: {data.vote_average}%

{data.overview}

) } export default ModalCard
